Name: Print Deck
Description: See the progress of your 3d prints via Octoprint on your stream deck

com.johnnymast.printdeck.progress.Name: Show Print progress
com.johnnymast.printdeck.progress.Tooltip: Show the OctoPrint progression on your Stream Deck

com.johnnymast.printdeck.openportal.Name: Open OctoPrint page
com.johnnymast.printdeck.openportal.Tooltip: Open your OctoPrint page in your web browser.

com.johnnymast.printdeck.progress.There was an error connecting to webhost: There was an error connecting to webhost. Hold how the button on your Stream Deck for 3 seconds to try again.
